columns.name: name
columns.description: The description of the permission set.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier (account ID) of the member account.

columns.name: parent_id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) for the parent root or organization unit (OU) whose accounts you want to list.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the account in the organization.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address associated with the AWS account.

columns.name: joined_method
columns.description: The method by which the account joined the organization.

columns.name: joined_timestamp
columns.description: The date the account became a part of the organization.
